alert.note: Alert for Chiricahua Mountains including Chiricahua National Monument (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 22 at 3:11AM MST until January 24 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY ABOVE 7000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 7000 feet. Total snow accumulations of up to 14 inches. * WHERE...Chiricahua Mountains. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Chiricahua Mountains including Chiricahua National Monument
